Generation IV.Diamond: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.
Generation IV.Pearl: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
Generation IV.Platinum: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

Generation V.Black: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.

Generation V.Black 2: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
Generation V.White 2: In its desperation to gulp down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.

Generation VI.X: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
Generation VI.Y: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

Generation VII.Sun: It needs to consume its own weight in food every day. As far as flavor is concerned, it's indifferent.
Generation VII.Moon: When it finds something that looks like it might be edible, it goes right ahead and swallows it whole. That's why it gets fatter day by day.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It hides food under its long fur, but it sometimes forgets about it and causes a stinky disturbance.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Anything that looks edible, Munchlax will go on and swallow whole. Its stomach is tough enough to handle it even if the food has gone rotten.

Generation VIII.Sword: Stuffing itself with vast amounts of food is its only concern. Whether the food is rotten or fresh, yummy or tasteless—it does not care.
Generation VIII.Shield: It stores food beneath its fur. It might share just one bite, but only if it really trusts you.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing it whole with almost no chewing.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Its robust stomach allows it to nonchalantly devour even rotted matter. It pays frequent visits to villages, seeking out food scraps intended for compost.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It needs to consume its own weight in food every day. As far as flavor is concerned, it's indifferent.
Generation IX.Violet: When it is voraciously gulping down food, it forgets about the food it has hidden under its fur.
